question: Kati bela sama share trading garna milcha?
context: Nepal Stock Exchange ma share trading ko samaya Monday dekhi Friday samma ho. Samanya trading ko samaya bihana 11 baje dekhi 3 baje samma ho. Yo samaya public holiday ma available hudaina.
response: Nepal Stock Exchange ma Monday dekhi Friday samma, bihana 11 baje dekhi 3 baje samma share trading garna milcha. Public holiday ma ta band huncha.

question: Margin account ko lagi minimum balance kati chahinchha?
context: Margin account kholna ko lagi, broker le minimum balance ko niyam lagayeko huncha. Samanya niyam anusaar, Nepal ma Rs. 50,000 minimum balance chahinchha. Broker anusar yo rakam farak huna sakcha.
response: Margin account kholna ko lagi broker le Rs. 50,000 minimum balance chahinchha, tara broker anusar farak parna sakcha.

question: IPO ma apply garna kasari garne?
context: IPO apply garna ko lagi mero share portal ya C-ASBA service upayog garna sakinchha. Bank ko account ASBA registered hunu parcha. Login garera desired IPO chhanot garna parcha ani required details fill garna parcha. Final confirmation diye pachhi IPO apply huncha.
response: IPO ma apply garna mero share portal ya C-ASBA service use garera login garna parcha. IPO chhanot garera details fill garera confirm garnu parcha.

question: Stock ko price kasari determine huncha?
context: Stock ko price demand ra supply ko aadhar ma determine huncha. Buyers ra sellers le kun price ma stock kharid ra bikri garna tayar huncha bhanne kura main factor huncha. Market ma aru economic factors pani stock price ma asar garchan.
response: Stock ko price demand ra supply ko aadhar ma determine huncha. Buyers ra sellers le kun price ma stock bikri ra kharid garna tayar huncha bhanne kura le main role khelcha.

question: Portfolio diversify garna ko fayda ke ho?
context: Portfolio diversify garnale risk minimization garna madad garcha. Ekai company ya sector ma matra invest garna ko badla multiple sectors ra companies ma invest garera loss ko risk kam huncha. Yo ek ramro risk management strategy ho.
response: Portfolio diversify garnale risk minimize garna madad garcha. Ekai sector ma matra invest nagari, different sectors ma invest garera loss ko sambhavana kam huncha.

question: Share market ma naya lagani garna kasari suru garna sakinchha?
context: Nepal ma share market suru garna ko lagi sabanda pahilo kaam Demat account kholnu ho. Demat account kholna ko lagi local bank ya broker office ma janu parcha. Tespachhi, mero share portal ma sign up garera C-ASBA account pani register garna parcha. Kunai IPO ya secondary market ma lagani garna purano company ko details, market ko trend, ra price fluctuation bare thaha hunu zaruri huncha. Lagani garna agadi aafno financial goal ra risk tolerance pani hernu parcha. Aadhunik apps ra tools pani available hun, jasle online trading sajilo banayeko cha. Lagani suru garnalai ramro research garnu sabai bhanda important ho.
response: Share market suru garna Demat account ra C-ASBA account kholnu parcha. Aafno financial goal ra risk tolerance herera ramro research garera lagani garna suru garna milcha.

question: Technical analysis kasari garincha?
context: Technical analysis ko lagi chart patterns, price movements, ra trading volume ko analysis garincha. Price history herera support ra resistance levels ko nirdharan garincha. Moving averages, RSI (Relative Strength Index), MACD (Moving Average Convergence Divergence) jasta indicators use garera stock ko trend ko analysis garincha. Technical analysis ko lagi tools jasari candlestick charts, line charts, ra bar charts ko upayog huncha. Yo process le purano data ko adhar ma future price ko projection banaucha, tara market ko unpredictable nature le junai analysis ma risk samayeko huncha.
response: Technical analysis ma chart patterns, price movements, ra indicators jasari RSI, MACD, ra moving averages ko analysis garincha. Support ra resistance levels ko nirdharan garera stock trend ko projection garincha.

question: Dividend kasari pay garincha?
context: Company le profit ko ek portion shareholders lai dividend ko rupma provide garcha. Dividend pay garna ko lagi board of directors le approval dinuparcha, ani tespachhi record date set garincha. Record date samma jasko naam shareholder ko list ma cha, tiniharu le dividend paunchan. Dividend cash ya additional shares ko rupma distribute garincha. Cash dividend ma paisa directly shareholder ko linked bank account ma jamma huncha. Share dividend ma ta naya shares assign garincha. Tyo company ko financial performance, profit, ra future growth plans ko aadhar ma dividend distribution ko decision huncha.
response: Dividend company le profit ko ek portion cash ya additional shares ko rupma distribute garcha. Record date samma shareholder list ma cha bhane tini dividend paunchan.

question: Long-term investment ko lagi ke kura hernu parcha?
context: Long-term investment ko lagi ramro company chhanot garnu sabai bhanda important ho. Company ko financial statements, profit growth, ra market position ko review garincha. Company le consistent dividend dinko record cha ki chaina, yo pani hernu parcha. Economic trends, industry growth potential, ra sector performance pani important factors hun. Diversification garera ekai sector ma lagani nagari multiple sectors ma investment garnu long-term success ko lagi sahayak huncha. Fundamental analysis jasari P/E ratio, debt-to-equity ratio, ra earnings growth pani carefully analysis garincha.
response: Long-term investment ma company ko financial health, market position, ra dividend record herera fundamental analysis garna parcha. Diversification pani jaruri cha.

question: Share ko price circuit breaker kasari kaam garcha?
context: Circuit breaker ek aauta mechanism ho, jasle share price ko extreme volatility control garna madad garcha. Nepal Stock Exchange ma tyo system lagoo huncha. Kunai share ko price ek certain limit (upper ya lower) cross garda circuit breaker activate huncha. Yo limit stock ko previous closing price ko 2% (level 1), 4% (level 2), ra 6% (level 3) ko percentage ma set huncha. Circuit breaker lagyo bhane, temporary trading suspension huncha, jasle market participants lai time dincha naya information process garna. Yo system le investor ko interest surakshit garna ra panic buying ya selling control garna kaam garcha.
response: Circuit breaker le price ko extreme volatility control garcha. Kunai share ko price 2%, 4%, ya 6% limit cross garda trading temporarily suspend huncha.

question: Nepal ma stock trading ko cost kasto huncha?
context: Nepal ma stock trading gareko bela different types of cost lagcha. Broker commission jasto fixed cost huncha, jun 0.40% dekhi 0.60% samma huncha total transaction amount ma. Clearing fee, SEBON fee, ra market tax pani lagcha. Broker le commission rate fixed rakhdai ajha high-volume traders ko lagi discount provide garcha. Tyo sanga, bank charge ra Demat account maintenance charge jasto recurring cost pani huncha. Yesto cost ko jankari rakhera lagani garna parcha kina bhane yo investment ko overall profit ma asar garcha.
response: Nepal ma stock trading ko cost broker commission, clearing fee, SEBON fee, ra market tax milaera lagcha. Broker commission 0.40% dekhi 0.60% samma huncha.

question: Short selling Nepal ma kina allowed chaina?
context: Short selling ek process ho jasma investors le stock borrow garera sell garchan ra future ma stock price ghatne aasha ma pharkauchhan. Nepal Stock Exchange ma short selling system implement chaina. Isko major karan ho market ko regulatory framework le short selling ko risk handle garna sakdaina. Short selling le speculative trading lai badhawa dincha jasle volatile market banauna sakcha. Financial stability suraksha ko lagi Nepal ma short selling prohibited cha. Sabai investor ko interest surakshit rakhna regulatory authorities le yasto system lagoo gareka chaina.
response: Short selling Nepal ma prohibited cha kina bhane isko risk high cha ra market ko stability surakshit rakhna yasto system implement chaina.

question: Stock split bhanda k ho?
context: Stock split ek process ho jasma company le ek share lai multiple smaller shares ma divide garcha. Isko karan le investor ko affordability badcha ra stock ko liquidity pani improve huncha. For example, ek share ko price Rs. 1000 cha bhane, 1:2 ratio ko stock split pachi 2 shares ko price Rs. 500-500 hunecha. Stock split le total valuation change gardaina, tara small investors lai share kharid garnu sajilo banaidinchha. Yesto process sabai share holders ko benefit ma implement garincha.
response: Stock split le ek share lai smaller shares ma divide garcha, jasko karan affordability badcha ra liquidity improve huncha.

question: Primary market ra secondary market ma ke farak cha?
context: Primary market ma company le naya shares issue garcha direct investors lai IPO ko madhyam bata. Secondary market ma, share holders le existing shares buy ra sell garna sakchan. Primary market ma fund raising garincha company ko growth ko lagi, tara secondary market ma price determination huncha demand ra supply ko aadhar ma. Nepal Stock Exchange secondary market ko example ho, jaha daily share trading huncha. Primary market ekai patak huncha, tara secondary market ma shares barambar trading garna milcha.
response: Primary market ma naya shares issue huncha ra secondary market ma existing shares buy-sell garincha. Primary market fund raising ko lagi cha ra secondary market price determination ko lagi.

question: Index fund ko barema thaha dinus na.
context: Index fund ek type ko mutual fund ho, jun specific stock market index (jasto ki NEPSE Index) ko performance track garcha. Isma actively manage garna ko aawasyakta hudaina, jasle cost low rakhcha. Index fund le diversification provide garcha kinabhane yo multiple companies ko stock ma invest garcha jun index ma listed huncha. Passive investment ko lagi index fund ek ramro option ho jasle risk minimize garcha ra stable return provide garcha. Nepal ma pani kunai index fund available cha jun local market ma listed cha.
response: Index fund ek mutual fund ho jun specific index ko performance track garcha, low cost ra diversification ko lagi ramro option ho.

question: Derivatives trading ko barema bujhaidinus.
context: Derivatives trading financial instruments ma garincha jasle underlying asset (stocks, commodities, currencies) ko future price movement ma aadharit huncha. Futures ra options yasto trading ma sabai bhanda common derivatives hun. Isko major purpose hedging ra speculation ho. Nepal ma derivatives trading abhi popular chaina, tara aru desh ma yasto trading le investor haru lai portfolio diversification ra risk management ko options dincha. Yasto market ma risk high cha, tara expert traders le yasto instruments bata ramro return kamauna sakchan.
response: Derivatives trading ma future price ko adhar ma instruments buy-sell garincha, hedging ra speculation ko lagi use garincha. Nepal ma derivatives trading abhi popular chaina.

question: Stock market crash ko karan ke huncha?
context: Stock market crash ko karan le major economic crisis, geopolitical tensions, overvaluation of stocks, ra panic selling samet parcha. Jaba investors le ekai patak large scale ma stocks bechnu thalchan, market ko demand ghatne huncha ra price ma sharp decline huncha. Nepal jasto developing market ma pani political instability ra regulatory changes le market crash ko risk badhcha. Aadhunik tools jasari circuit breakers ra market stability ko lagi policies lagoo garera crash ko impact minimize garincha.
response: Stock market crash ko karan panic selling, overvaluation, ra economic crisis huncha. Nepal ma political instability ra regulatory changes le pani asar garcha.

question: Mutual fund investment secure cha ki nai?
context: Mutual fund investment secure cha ki chaina bhanne kura fund ko nature, market condition, ra management ko ability ma nirbhar garcha. Mutual fund le diversified portfolio ma invest garcha jasle risk minimize garcha, tara market downturn le sabai fund ma asar parna sakcha. Regulated mutual funds sabai investors ko protection ko lagi SEBON jasta regulatory body le monitor garcha. Nepal ma mutual fund ko growth abhi starting phase ma cha, tara yo small investors ko lagi ek safe ra accessible option ho.
response: Mutual fund investment diversified portfolio le secure banaucha, tara market downturn le asar parna sakcha. Nepal ma SEBON le regulated fund secure rakhcha.

question: Nepal ma IPO allotment kasari huncha?
context: Nepal ma IPO allotment process SEBON ko guidelines anusaar garincha. Kunai IPO ma demand supply bhanda dherei hune karan sabai applicants lai shares allocate garna sakdaina. Tyo bela lottery system ko upayog garincha jasma sabai eligible applicants lai equal chance dincha. Applicants le mero share portal ya C-ASBA ma apno application ko status check garna sakcha. IPO allotment ko criteria ma minimum unit haru allocate garincha ani lottery ma naam aayeko haru le matra additional units paunchan. Allotment pachi remaining amount automatically applicant ko bank account ma refund huncha.
response: Nepal ma IPO allotment lottery system ko madhyam bata huncha. Sabai eligible applicants le equal chance paunchan, ra remaining amount refund huncha.

question: Market capitalization ko matlab ke ho?
context: Market capitalization bhaneko company ko total value ho jun stock price ra total outstanding shares multiply garera calculate garincha. For example, ek company ko share price Rs. 500 cha ra total outstanding shares 10,00,000 huncha bhane market capitalization Rs. 50 crore hunecha. Yo ek company ko size, performance, ra market ko position determine garna use garincha. Large-cap companies le stable growth ra dividend offer garna sakchan, jasle risk low banaidinchha. Small-cap companies ta high growth potential le high risk pani liye hunchan.
response: Market capitalization company ko total value ho jun stock price ra total outstanding shares ko multiply le calculate garincha. Large-cap stable huncha, small-cap growth potential le high risk hunchan.

question: Stock market bullish ra bearish ko matlab ke ho?
context: Bullish market bhaneko jaba stock prices consistently badhdai jancha ra investor haru le optimistic view rakhchan tyo situation ho. Bullish market le economic growth, strong corporate earnings, ra investor confidence ko sanket dincha. Bearish market ta usko ulto ho, jaba stock prices consistently ghatdai jancha ra investor haru le pessimistic view rakhchan. Bearish market economic slowdown, weak earnings, ya geopolitical instability ko karan le auna sakcha. Dui situation ma investment ko strategy farak huncha, jasari bullish market ma aggressive investment ra bearish market ma defensive strategy adopt garincha.
response: Bullish market ma stock prices badcha ra optimism huncha, bearish market ma stock prices ghatcha ra pessimism huncha. Dui situation ma investment strategy farak huncha.

question: Penny stocks ma lagani safe cha ki nai?
context: Penny stocks low-priced stocks huncha jun small companies le issue garcha. Yasto stocks le high growth potential dikhaucha, tara high risk sanga aauchha. Nepal ma penny stocks ma lagani garna agadi company ko background, financial health, ra market position bare ramro research garna parcha. Penny stocks volatile huncha jasle investor ko capital loss ko risk badhauna sakcha. Experience ra high-risk tolerance bhayeka investors lai matra yasto stocks ma lagani garna sujhab garincha.
response: Penny stocks ma lagani high risk sanga aauchha. Ramro research ra high-risk tolerance bhayeka investors ko lagi yasto lagani upayogi hunchha.

question: Stock ko dividend yield kasari calculate garincha?
context: Dividend yield calculate garna company ko annual dividend per share lai stock ko current price le divide garincha. For example, ek company ko annual dividend Rs. 10 cha ra stock price Rs. 200 cha bhane, dividend yield 5% huncha. Yo ratio le investor lai company le kasto return provide gariraheko cha bhanne sojho idea dincha. High dividend yield le good return indicate garcha, tara consistent growth ra dividend payment herera matra investment decision lina parcha.
response: Dividend yield annual dividend per share lai stock ko current price le divide garincha. Yo investor lai company ko return ko idea dincha.

question: Stock market volatility kasari measure garincha?
context: Stock market volatility ko measurement standard deviation ya VIX (Volatility Index) ko madhyam bata garincha. Standard deviation le ek period ma stock price ko fluctuation ko average measure garcha. VIX ta ek specific index ho jun stock market ko future volatility ko expectation dekhaucha. High volatility le risk badhaune ra market uncertainty ko sanket dincha. Nepal ma volatility ko direct index chaina, tara price fluctuation analysis le volatility measure garna sakinchha. Investors le yasto tools use garera informed decision lina sakchan.
response: Stock market volatility standard deviation ya VIX jasto tools le measure garincha. High volatility le risk badhaune ra uncertainty ko sanket dincha.

question: Blue-chip companies ko stocks kina popular huncha?
context: Blue-chip companies ta established, financially strong, ra consistent performance dikhaucha. Yasto companies le reliable dividend payment ra stable growth ko guarantee dincha, jasle long-term investors ma popularity badhauncha. Nepal ma jasto volatile market ma pani blue-chip stocks le risk management ko lagi ramro option provide garcha. Yasto companies ko stocks kam volatility ra high liquidity sanga aauchha, jasle sabai type ko investors lai attract garcha.
response: Blue-chip companies financially strong ra consistent performance dikhaucha. Yasto stocks kam volatility ra high liquidity le sabai investors ma popular huncha.

question: Nepal ma margin trading kasari garincha?
context: Nepal ma margin trading ko provision limited cha, tara kunai broker firms le yasto service provide garchan. Margin trading ma investor le broker sanga paisa borrow garera stock purchase garcha. Isko lagi collateral ko requirement huncha jasto ki existing stocks ya cash deposit. Margin trading high risk sanga aauchha, kinabhane stock price ghatda loss le multiply huncha. Nepal Stock Exchange le margin trading ko lagi guidelines set gareko cha, tara sabai brokers le yasto service dindaina. Investors le yasto option use garna agadi ramro research garna parcha.
response: Nepal ma margin trading limited cha ra kunai broker firms le matra provide garcha. Yasto trading ma high risk huncha ra collateral ko requirement cha.

question: Bonus share ra right share ma ke farak cha?
context: Bonus share bhaneko company le aafno profit ko ek hissa shareholders lai additional shares ko rup ma distribute garcha, jasle shareholder ko investment badhaunchha tara paisa tirnu pardaina. Right share bhaneko ta company le additional capital raise garna existing shareholders lai naya shares lower price ma offer garcha. Bonus share ma shareholders lai investment gareko paisa ko reward milcha, tara right share le tyo opportunity dincha ki naya shares sasto price ma purchase garna. Duiyo process company ko financial situation ra expansion plans ma nirbhar huncha.
response: Bonus share profit ko ek hissa ho jun free ma milcha, right share chai lower price ma purchase garna milcha capital raise garna.

question: Stock market ma liquidity ko matlab ke ho?
context: Stock market ma liquidity bhaneko ek asset lai sajilai cash ma convert garna milne capacity ho. High liquidity ko matlab cha ki market ma buy ra sell garna sajilo huncha, jasle price stability maintain garna madad garcha. Nepal Stock Exchange ma blue-chip stocks jasto high liquidity stocks hun, tara small-cap ya penny stocks ma liquidity kam huncha. Liquidity badhauna investors le consistent trading garna ra market participants le investment opportunities explore garna parcha.
response: Liquidity bhaneko asset lai sajilai cash ma convert garna milne capacity ho. High liquidity le price stability maintain garcha.

question: Nepal ma stock ko valuation kasari garincha?
context: Nepal ma stock valuation garna fundamental analysis ra technical analysis dubaiko upayog huncha. Fundamental analysis ma company ko financial health, P/E ratio, earnings growth, ra debt-to-equity ratio jaise parameters study garincha. Technical analysis ma stock ko price trends, moving averages, ra chart patterns analyze garincha. NEPSE index ko performance pani valuation ko lagi crucial indicator ho. Nepal ma, especially retail investors, valuation tools le ramro decision lina sakchan, tara company-specific risk pani consider garna parcha.
response: Nepal ma stock valuation fundamental ra technical analysis ko maddat le garincha, jasle financial health ra price trends analyze garcha.

question: Stop-loss order ko upayog kasari garincha?
context: Stop-loss order le investor lai specific price ma stock sell garna set garna madad garcha, jasle loss minimize garna sakcha. For example, ek stock ko current price Rs. 500 cha ra stop-loss Rs. 450 set gareko cha bhane, price Rs. 450 samma ghatda stock automatically sell huncha. Yo system volatile market ma risk manage garna upayogi huncha. Nepal Stock Exchange ma stop-loss order ko full-fledged implementation chaina, tara active monitoring gare stop-loss ko principle manually implement garna sakinchha.
response: Stop-loss order le specific price ma stock automatically sell garna set garincha loss minimize garna. Nepal ma manually monitoring garera yo implement garna sakinchha.

question: Stock market index kasari kaam garcha?
context: Stock market index ta group of selected stocks ko performance measure garna use garincha. NEPSE index Nepal ma ek prominent example ho, jun listed companies ko overall performance represent garcha. Yo index le market ko mood, economic health, ra investor sentiment analyze garna madad garcha. Index ko movement le investors lai buy ya sell decision lina guide garna sakcha. Ek sustainable portfolio banaunda index tracking ek ramro tool ho.
response: Stock market index group of stocks ko performance measure garcha. NEPSE index le Nepal ko overall market performance represent garcha.

question: Portfolio diversification ko faida ke ho?
context: Portfolio diversification le ekai sector ma investment nagari multiple sectors, asset classes, ra geographies ma lagani garna encourage garcha. Diversification le risk minimize garna madad garcha, kinabhane ek sector ma loss bhae arko sector ko profit le balance garna sakcha. Nepal ma stock market volatile huncha, jasle lagani ma diversification ko mahatwa badhaunchha. Yasto strategy le long-term stability ra consistent return ensure garcha.
response: Portfolio diversification le risk minimize garna ra long-term stability ensure garna madad garcha. Nepal jasto volatile market ma yo essential cha.

question: IPO ma oversubscription bhaye k huncha?
context: IPO ma oversubscription bhaneko demand supply bhanda dherei bhaeko situation ho. Nepal ma IPO oversubscription bhae SEBON ko guidelines anusaar lottery system implement garincha. Eligible applicants lai minimum shares allocate garincha, ra lottery ma naam aayeka applicants le additional shares paunchan. Refund process automatically applicant ko bank account ma huncha, jasle applicants ko inconvenience minimize garcha. Oversubscription company ko high demand ra investor confidence ko sanket ho.
response: IPO oversubscription bhae lottery system implement garincha ra minimum shares allocate garincha. Remaining amount refund automatically huncha.

question: Online trading kasari suru garna sakinchha?
context: Online trading suru garna ko lagi sabanda pahile Demat account ra trading account kholnu parcha. Nepal ma mero share platform ra broker apps le online trading ko lagi sajilo environment provide garchan. Account verification pachi, bank account link garera funds deposit garna milcha. Market research, live price tracking, ra order placement pani online trading ma garna milcha. Yo process le physical presence ko aawasyakta hatauncha ra lagani sajilo banaidinchha.
response: Online trading ko lagi Demat ra trading account kholnu parcha. Broker apps ra mero share platform le live price tracking ra order placement madad garcha.

question: Nepal ma stock market ma tax structure kasto cha?
context: Nepal ma stock market ma capital gains tax lagcha, jun short-term ra long-term gain anusar vary garcha. Short-term gain ma 7.5% tax lagcha, ra long-term gain ma 5% tax lagcha. Dividend income ma 5% tax deduct garincha. Transaction ko bela ma SEBON fee, broker commission, ra capital market tax pani lagcha. Tax compliance ko lagi investors le mero share portal ya broker statement ko upayog garera calculation accurate banauna parcha.
response: Nepal ma stock market ma capital gains tax short-term gain ma 7.5% ra long-term gain ma 5% lagcha. Dividend income ma 5% tax deduct huncha.

question: Blue-chip stocks ra small-cap stocks ma ke difference cha?
context: Blue-chip stocks established ra financially stable companies ko shares hun. Yasto stocks consistently dividend provide garcha ra kam risk sanga aauchha. Small-cap stocks chai smaller companies ko shares hun, jasle high growth potential dikhauchha tara high risk pani huncha. Blue-chip stocks le stability ra predictable returns dincha, tara small-cap stocks ma volatility le return uncertainty badhaunchha. Nepal ma Nabil Bank, NIC Asia jasto companies blue-chip ma aauchha, tara small IT ya manufacturing firms small-cap stocks ma parcha.
response: Blue-chip stocks stable ra kam risk sanga aauchha, small-cap stocks high growth potential sanga tara high risk pani huncha.

question: Nepal ma ek din ma kati shares buy/sell garna milcha?
context: Nepal Stock Exchange (NEPSE) ko guidelines anusaar ek din ma buy/sell garna ko lagi kunai fixed limit chaina, tara broker firms le apno limits impose garna sakchan. Tyo investor ko portfolio size, broker policies, ra available margin ko adhar ma depend garcha. Active day trading ko lagi investor le transaction costs ra market risk laai ni consider garna parcha. NEPSE ma T+2 settlement system huncha jasle transaction pachi duita working days ma settlement garna parcha.
response: NEPSE ma ek din ma buy/sell garna limit chaina, tara broker ko policy anusar restrictions huncha. T+2 system le transaction settle garincha.

question: Stock split bhanda ko ke ho?
context: Stock split ma ek share lai thulo sankhya ma divide garincha, jasle stock price ghatcha tara total market capitalization constant rahanchha. For example, ek company ko stock Rs. 1000 cha, ra company le 1:5 split garcha bhane, ek share 5 shares ma divide hunchha ra naya share price Rs. 200 huncha. Split le affordability badhauncha ra liquidity increase garcha. Nepal ma stock split companies ko investor attraction badhauna garincha.
response: Stock split ma ek share divide hunchha ra price ghatcha tara market capitalization constant rahanchha. Yo affordability ra liquidity badhauna helpful huncha.

question: Nepal ma mutual funds kasari kaam garcha?
context: Nepal ma mutual funds ko operation fund management companies jasari Siddhartha Capital ya NIBL Ace Capital le garincha. Mutual funds investors ko paisa ek jaga jamma garera stocks, bonds, ra debentures ma invest garcha. Yasto funds le professional management ra diversification provide garcha. Mutual funds ko NAV (Net Asset Value) ko monitoring garera investor le apno investment ko performance herna sakcha. Long-term investors ko lagi mutual funds ramro option huncha.
response: Nepal ma mutual funds investors ko paisa jamma garera stocks ra bonds ma invest garcha. Yo professional management ra diversification provide garcha.

question: Circuit breaker kasari kaam garcha?
context: Circuit breaker bhaneko stock market ma price ko sudden rise ya fall le market ma disruption aunu purva tyo control garna system ho. Nepal ma NEPSE le specific percentage thresholds define gareko cha, jasma ek din ma stock price 10% badhna ya ghatna mildaina. Circuit breaker le investor panic ya speculative buying/selling control garna madad garcha. Market ko stability ensure garna yasto system important cha.
response: Circuit breaker le stock price ko sudden rise ya fall control garcha. NEPSE ma ek din ma price 10% bhanda badhna/gatna mildaina.

question: Demat account kasari kholnu parcha?
context: Nepal ma Demat account kholna ko lagi investor le DP (Depository Participant) jasto ki NMB Capital, Siddhartha Capital jasto institutions ma jaana parcha. PAN card, citizenship, ra passport size photo ko requirement huncha. Application form fill garepachi account 1-2 din ma active huncha. Yo account le paperless transaction ko facility dincha, jun IPO application, share transfer, ra dividend collection ma use huncha.
response: Demat account kholna ko lagi DP ma jaanuparcha ra PAN card, citizenship, photo chaahinchha. Account le IPO application ra transaction easy banaunchha.

question: Long-term investment kasari suru garne?
context: Long-term investment suru garna investor le sabanda pahile financial goals define garera suitable sectors select garnu parcha. Nepal ma banks, hydropower, ra blue-chip stocks jasto sectors long-term ko lagi reliable huncha. Market ko trend analyze garera, regular SIP (Systematic Investment Plan) jasto strategy follow garnu ramro huncha. Yasto investment le compounding benefit ra financial security dincha.
response: Long-term investment ko lagi financial goals define garera blue-chip stocks jasto sectors ma lagani garnu parcha. SIP strategy le compounding benefit dincha.

question: Dividend payout kasari receive garincha?
context: Nepal ma dividend payout receive garna ko lagi investor le apno Demat account active ra bank account linked rakhnu parcha. Company le dividend announce garepachi tyo NEPSE list ma publish garincha. Investors ko linked bank account ma dividend amount auto-credit huncha. Company le cash dividend provide garna ya bonus shares distribute garna sakcha.
response: Dividend receive garna Demat ra bank account linked hunuparcha. Dividend amount auto-credit ya bonus shares ko rup ma milcha.

question: Day trading safe cha ki long-term investment?
context: Day trading ma ekai din ma buy ra sell garincha jasle quick profit ko possibility dikhaucha, tara high risk sanga aauchha. Long-term investment ma consistent growth ko possibility cha ra risk relatively kam huncha. Nepal ma volatile market le day trading challenging banauncha. Tesaile, beginner investors lai long-term investment prioritize garna sujhab garincha.
response: Day trading quick profit sanga tara high risk ma aauchha. Long-term investment safe ra consistent growth ko lagi suitable cha.

question: Nepal ma broker selection ko lagi ke hernu parcha?
context: Broker selection ko lagi sabanda pahile broker ko SEBON ko license confirm garna parcha. Broker le online trading platform, low transaction costs, ra reliable customer service provide garna parcha. Nepal ma active brokers haru jasto ki NIBL Ace Capital ra Prabhu Capital, good reputation sanga aauchha. Broker selection agadi feedback ra reviews pani check garna parcha.
response: Broker selection ko lagi SEBON license confirm garera low cost, online platform, ra customer service evaluate garna parcha.

question: Stock average price kasari calculate garincha?
context: Stock average price calculate garna, total investment ko amount lai total purchased shares ko sankhya le divide garincha. For example, ek investor le 100 shares Rs. 500 ma ra arko 50 shares Rs. 600 ma kincha bhane, total investment Rs. 50,000 + Rs. 30,000 = Rs. 80,000 huncha. Total shares 150 huncha. Aba average price = Rs. 80,000 / 150 = Rs. 533.33 huncha. Yo calculation le investor lai average cost samjhina madad garcha.
response: Stock average price calculate garna total investment amount lai total purchased shares le divide garincha. Example: Rs. 80,000 / 150 = Rs. 533.33.

question: Dividend yield ko matlab ke ho?
context: Dividend yield ek company le provide gareko dividend ra stock price ko ratio ho. Formula ho: Dividend Yield = (Annual Dividend / Current Stock Price) * 100. For example, ek company le Rs. 20 ko annual dividend ra Rs. 400 ko stock price cha bhane, dividend yield = (20 / 400) * 100 = 5% huncha. Yo ratio le investors lai company ko dividend policy ra return ko clarity dincha. High dividend yield ma interest lekin company ko growth potential pani consider garnu parcha.
response: Dividend yield formula ho (Annual Dividend / Current Stock Price) * 100. Yo investor lai company ko dividend policy ko clarity dincha.

question: Stock split ra reverse stock split ma ke difference cha?
context: Stock split ma ek share multiple shares ma divide huncha jasle stock price ghatdai affordability badhauncha. Reverse stock split ma multiple shares ek share ma convert huncha jasle stock price badhauncha. For example, stock split 1:5 ma ek share 5 shares ma divide huncha, tara reverse stock split 5:1 ma 5 shares ek share ma merge huncha. Stock split le liquidity increase garcha, reverse stock split le price stability target garcha.
response: Stock split ma share divide garincha ra price ghatdai affordability badhauncha. Reverse stock split ma shares merge garera price badhauncha.

question: NEPSE ma margin trading ko upayog kasari garincha?
context: Margin trading ma investor le broker bata loan li share purchase garcha. NEPSE ma margin trading ko lagi collateral rakhnu parcha, jasle risk manage garna madad garcha. Margin account setup pachi, investor le apno existing portfolio ko 50% samma margin utilize garna sakcha. Tara margin trading high risk sanga aauchha, kinabhane market price ghatda loss amplify huncha. Nepal ma experienced traders lai matra margin trading upayogi huncha.
response: Margin trading ma broker bata loan li share kincha. NEPSE ma collateral rakhnu parcha ra 50% samma margin utilize garna milcha.

question: Stock delisting ko karan ke huncha?
context: Stock delisting bhanda ko company ko shares NEPSE bata remove hunu ho. Delisting ko karan financial irregularities, non-compliance with regulations, ya company ko operational failure huncha. For example, kunai company le mandatory financial reporting na gareko ya SEBON guidelines violate gareko bhane, delisting huncha. Delisting pachi shares secondary market ma trade hudaina ra investors ko liquidity risk badhauncha.
response: Stock delisting financial irregularities, non-compliance, ya operational failure le huncha. Delisted shares secondary market ma trade hudaina.

question: Corporate action ko examples ke ke hun?
context: Corporate actions company le shareholders ko hit ma liera garne major decisions hun. Examples: dividend declaration, bonus shares issue, stock split, right issue, ya mergers and acquisitions. Dividend declaration le profit ko ek hissa distribute garcha. Stock split le affordability badhauncha, bonus shares le investment ko value enhance garcha. Nepal ma corporate actions NEPSE ra SEBON guidelines ko anusar implement huncha.
response: Corporate actions examples ma dividend, bonus shares, stock split, right issue, ra mergers sammilit huncha. Yo shareholders ko hit ma liera garincha.

question: Stop-limit order kasari kaam garcha?
context: Stop-limit order ma investor le ek stop price ra ek limit price define garcha. Stop price pugi sakepachi order trigger huncha, tara limit price bhanda bahira execute hudaina. For example, ek stock ko current price Rs. 500 cha. Stop price Rs. 480 ra limit price Rs. 475 set garincha bhane, price Rs. 480 pachi sell order activate huncha tara Rs. 475 bhanda tala execute hudaina. Yo order risk manage garna helpful huncha.
response: Stop-limit order ma stop price pugi order trigger huncha tara limit price bhanda bahira execute hudaina. Risk manage garna yo helpful cha.

question: Technical indicators ma RSI ko upayog kasari garincha?
context: RSI (Relative Strength Index) ek technical indicator ho jun stock ko overbought ya oversold position bataucha. RSI 0-100 scale ma measure huncha. 70 bhanda mathi RSI overbought condition ho ra price ghatne sambhawana badhauncha. 30 bhanda tala RSI oversold condition ho ra price badhne sambhawana dikhauchha. Nepal ma short-term trading decision lina RSI ko upayog actively garincha.
response: RSI le stock ko overbought (70 mathi) ra oversold (30 tala) position bataucha. Yo short-term trading decision ma helpful cha.

question: IPO ma application reject hune karan ke huncha?
context: IPO ma application reject hune karan ma mismatched details, insufficient bank balance, duplicate applications, ya invalid Demat account details huncha. Nepal ma mero share platform ko upayog garera IPO apply garda details carefully verify garnu parcha. SEBON guidelines ko violation ya technical issues le pani application reject huncha. Investors lai apno information accurate rakhnai parcha.
response: IPO ma mismatched details, insufficient balance, ya invalid Demat account le application reject huncha. Accurate information provide garna zaruri cha.

question: Hydropower stocks ma lagani garna risk ke huncha?
context: Hydropower stocks ma lagani garna ko risk operational delays, regulatory issues, ra unpredictable weather conditions huncha. Nepal ma hydropower sector ko profitability pani NEA sanga ko power purchase agreement (PPA) ko terms ma nirbhar huncha. High capital requirement ra long gestation period le pani investor ko returns delay garcha. Tesaile, hydropower ma investment garnu purva company ko project pipeline ra financial health analyze garnu zaruri cha.
response: Hydropower stocks ma regulatory issues, operational delays, ra weather risk huncha. Investment garnu purva company ko financial health analyze garnu zaruri cha.

question: Right shares bhaneko ke ho?
context: Right shares bhaneko existing shareholders lai additional shares discounted rate ma purchase garne opportunity ho. Company le additional capital raise garna ko lagi right shares issue garcha. Shareholders lai proportionate basis ma right share ko eligibility milcha, jasto ki 1:2 ratio ma existing 2 shares ma ek naya share purchase garna milcha. Nepal ma right shares issue garda SEBON ko approval le mandatory huncha.
response: Right shares existing shareholders lai discounted rate ma additional shares purchase garna dincha. Yo company le capital raise garna issue garcha.

question: Nepal ma stock market open ra close time kati ho?
context: NEPSE ko trading hours Sunday dekhi Friday samma hunchha, tara Saturday ma market close rahanchha. Trading ko time subha 11:00 AM bata 3:00 PM samma ho. Pre-opening session 10:30 AM bata suru huncha jun 11:00 AM samma chalcha. Regular trading ma buy/sell orders place garna milcha, tara tyo trading time bitne bittikai order execution stop huncha.
response: Nepal ma stock market Sunday dekhi Friday samma 11:00 AM bata 3:00 PM samma khulla huncha.

question: Nepal ma IPO apply garna minimum amount kati ho?
context: Nepal ma IPO ma apply garna minimum 10 shares purchase garna parcha. Yasko minimum cost issue price (usually Rs. 100 per share) anusar calculate garincha. For example, Rs. 100 per share ko IPO ma apply garna ko lagi minimum Rs. 1,000 chaahinchha. Mero Share platform ya broker bata IPO application garna sakinchha.
response: Nepal ma IPO apply garna minimum 10 shares kinna parcha, jasko cost issue price anusar calculate huncha.

question: Portfolio diversification kina garnu parcha?
context: Portfolio diversification le investment risk minimize garcha. Different sectors ma invest garera ek sector ko negative impact le portfolio lai affect garnu daina. For example, hydropower, banking, ra manufacturing stocks ma invest gareko investor ko portfolio diversified huncha. Diversification le consistent returns ko sambhawana badhauncha ra losses ko chance ghatauchha.
response: Portfolio diversification le risk minimize garera consistent returns ensure garcha. Different sectors ma invest garna zaruri cha.

question: Nepal ma online trading platform ko upayog kasari garincha?
context: Nepal ma NEPSE le authorized brokers ko online trading platforms provide garcha, jasto ki TMS (Trading Management System). Online trading suru garna ko lagi investor le apno broker account active rakhnu parcha. Login garepachi buy/sell orders place garna milcha. Real-time market data analyze garera trading decisions lina online platform helpful huncha.
response: Nepal ma online trading platform ko lagi broker account active garera TMS platform bata buy/sell orders place garincha.

question: Nepal ma bonus shares kasari receive garincha?
context: Nepal ma bonus shares company le apno profit ko ek hissa existing shareholders ma distribute garera issue garcha. Bonus shares automatically shareholder ko Demat account ma deposit huncha. Tyo shares NEPSE ma listing bhayepachi secondary market ma trade garna milcha. Bonus shares ko purpose investor ko holdings lai badhaune ho.
response: Bonus shares automatically Demat account ma deposit huncha. Yo shareholder ko holdings badhauna company le distribute garcha.

question: Nepal ma penny stocks ma lagani garna risk cha?
context: Penny stocks low price ra low market capitalization ko stocks hun, jasle high risk carry garcha. Nepal ma yasto stocks ko liquidity low huncha ra volatility badhauncha. Kunai penny stocks le significant return dincha tara majority stocks le loss generate garna sakcha. Tesaile, penny stocks ma invest garnu purva company ko fundamentals analyze garnu zaruri cha.
response: Penny stocks high risk sanga aauchha ra volatility badhauncha. Investment garnu purva company ko fundamentals analyze garnu zaruri cha.

question: Nepal ma ETF (Exchange Traded Funds) available cha?
context: Nepal ma ETF ko concept naya ho ra actively promote bhai raheko cha. ETF le ek jasto portfolio lai track garcha, jasto ki NEPSE index. ETF ma invest garera investor le diversified exposure sanga low cost ko advantage lincha. Tyo mutual fund jasto ho tara stocks jasto secondary market ma trade huncha.
response: Nepal ma ETF ko concept naya cha, jun index track garcha ra diversified exposure dincha. Yo low cost ko advantage sanga aauchha.

question: Company ko AGM ma shareholder ko role ke ho?
context: Company ko AGM (Annual General Meeting) shareholders le company ko financial performance review garna, important decisions approve garna, ra board of directors ko election ma participate garna organize huncha. Shareholders le dividend approval, policy changes, ra strategic decisions ma apno voting rights use garna sakcha. Nepal ma AGM ma shareholder presence financial transparency ensure garna vital huncha.
response: AGM ma shareholders le company ko performance review, dividend approve, ra board election ma participate garna sakcha.

question: Nepal ma hydropower sector ma investment ko sambhawana kasto cha?
context: Nepal ma hydropower sector ma investment ko sambhawana promising cha, tara regulatory challenges, construction delays, ra financing constraints le impact parcha. NEA sanga ko PPA terms favorable cha bhane hydropower projects le significant returns generate garna sakcha. Hydropower stocks ma lagani garnu purva financial statements ra project pipeline study garnu zaruri cha.
response: Hydropower sector promising cha tara regulatory challenges ra delays le impact parcha. Investment agadi project pipeline study garnu zaruri cha.
